newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: EDP keen to find Spanish partner.
newsitem.headline: EDP keen to find Spanish partner.

text.p: Portuguese state utility EDP-Electricidade de Portugal is keen to find a Spanish partner as the electricity market is integrating in Iberia, EDP President Antonio de Almeida said.
"We are facing a very competitive Iberian market. In this situation, there are two solutions -- one is open war, and the other is to form alliances," Almeida told reporters.
"It makes sense for us to have a Spanish partner," he added.
He said a partnership between EDP and a Spanish company could pave the way for business opportunities in Latin America, including Brazil.
